name: Yeti Free
description:
A browser game built on Phaser.io that resembles SkiFree except instead of the skiers, you play as the monster (yeti).

Catch and eat skiers by moving around the mountain slope to gain points and keep your health up. Avoid harmful objects that take your points and health. See how many points you can rack up in the 10  levels 45 second long.

Control with the arrow keys or with wasd keys.
